channel.title: How do i open my port?
channel.description:
I checked a port checker on a website. and it said "Port 80 closed on (ip address)"
How do l open my port?
I'd be real thankful if u could help me with this problem. Comments?

item.title: How do i open my port?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

f0r_th3_l0s3:

Where do i go inside the firewall?

Look on a website for a tutorial. or Google it.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i open my port?
item.dc:creator: @RYouSerius RYouSerius
item.description:
@RYouSerius wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:8, topic:386001”][quote author=RYouSerius link=topic=481753.msg3528010#msg3528010 date=1299970339]

You idiots, he isn’t asking how to port forward, he is asking how to OPEN HIS PORT.

@OP: Do it through your firewall, open the port that you port forwarded with; also, you should be hosting your server on the port 43594/5555, but you ultimately don’t have to.

Dude…
Simple port forward got that option. you just need 1 click and then its done
i use that program for all the ports i open
[/quote]
I posted that comment at the fact that you guys were telling him to port forward.[/quote]
EPIC FAIL :eek:

Read full topic
item.source: How do i open my port?
